forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early followed by cloudy skies this afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 21C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this morning, then becoming cloudy during the afternoon. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 71F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 52F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High near 20C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High around 70F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early then becoming mostly cloudy later at night. Low 49F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High around 20C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 69F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 47F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High around 20C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 69F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 47F. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mainly sunny sky. High 21C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 72F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low near 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 67F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 51F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 19C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 67F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening. Fog developing overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 68F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies early giving way to clouds and a few showers after midnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 19C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 67F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 19C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 67F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A shower or two around the area in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
